law.catch_line: Compliance with code not necessary on purchases from federal government.
law.text: The provisions of KRS Chapter 45A and KRS 162.070 shall not apply to purchases made by the boards of education within the Commonwealth of Kentucky from the United States of America, or any agency thereof.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 552, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 250, sec. 18, effective April 9, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 104, effective January 1, 1980. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 187, sec. 1.
